message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and understand its value. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
